languages.text:
"Пенится пасть, наваждения ловит, кусая плоть ложной добычи.
Колдовская кручина стала ему уроком навеки,
Гложет щенка братская кровь, не пролитая чудом".

"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."
languages.original_text:
"Пенится пасть, наваждения ловит, кусая плоть ложной добычи.
Колдовская кручина стала ему уроком навеки,
Гложет щенка братская кровь, не пролитая чудом".

traits.locale_text:
"Foams the mouth of the spellbound runt,
Biting the flesh of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
The pup, scarred by brotherly blood all but spilt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
« L'écume à la bouche,
l'avorton ensorcelé
referme ses mâchoires
sur des proies qui n'en sont pas.
À jamais le louveteau se souviendra
de ce sort ignoble et de sa terreur à l'idée
du sang qu'il a ainsi failli verser. »
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."

traits.locale_text:

du sang qu'il a ainsi failli verser. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
«Espumea la boca
del cachorro embrujado,
buscando el daño
de una presa equivocada.
No olvidará el joven el hechizo,
marcado por la sangre de su hermano
casi derramada».
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."

traits.locale_text:

casi derramada».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
“被施恶咒的幼狼，
嘴里泛着白沫。
拼命撕咬着，
不是猎物的猎物。
沾满兄弟之血的幼狼，
将会永远铭记，
那悲恸的哀嚎。”
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."

traits.locale_text:

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
口の中が泡立つ
呪縛されたラントの
肉を噛む
見誤った獲物のを。
魔術的な悲しみは永遠に忘れない
兄弟の血に傷ついた子犬
すべてこぼれ落ちた。
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Schäumt das Maul
des verzauberten Welpen,
beißt ins Fleisch
falsch gewitterter Beute.
Die magische Trauer wird niemals
der Welpe vergessen, gezeichnet von
fast vergossenem brüderlichem Blut."
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Ağzı köpüklenir
Büyüyle bağlı çömezin,
Etini ısırır
Yanlış gördüğü hedefin.
Ebediyen hatırlayacak yaralı yavru kurt,
Yara izini, büyüsel kederini
Dökülmek üzere olan kanın."
languages.original_text:
"Foams the mouth
of the spellbound runt,
biting the flesh
of prey misperceived.
The sorcerous grief will forever remember
the pup, scarred by brotherly blood
all but spilt."
